data.title: Girlfriend Or Wife: Is Bryton James Married To Christel Khalil? Everything To Know About The Theater Actor

data.text:
The curiosity about Bryton James, an American actor, girlfriend, or wife, Christel Khalil, has sparked debate among netizens. Here is what we know about Bryton.

Bryton McClure, aka Bryton James, is an American musical theatre, film, and television actor. He appeared in Richie Crawford on the ABC/CBS sitcom Family Matters as a child actor.

The actor is currently known for portraying the character of Devon Hamilton on the CBS opera The Young and the Restless. For the surface, the actor has also won two Daytime Emmy Awards.

At the age of 2, James began in show business. The actor appeared in multiple magazines ads and commercials, including one with singer Michael Jackson.

Table of Contents

Is Bryton James Married To Christel Khalil?

Bryton James Children Details

Bryton James Net Worth Explored

Meet Bryton James On Instagram

Is Bryton James Married To Christel Khalil?

No, Bryton James is not married to Christel Khalil. Christel is also an American Actress and is best known for her role as Lily Winters on the CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless.

Bryton is best friend with The Young and the Testless co-star, Christel. The actress was married to Stephen Hensley in September 2008. Bryton served as a groomsman at her wedding.

On April 17, 2010, Christel gave birth to their son at home water birth. Bryton is the godfather of Christelâs son, while Fadhia Marcelin is his godmother.

In early 2011, Christel separated from Stephen and divorced later that year. In 2015, the actress stated that she had been dating bar runner Ray Wicks for four years and ended their relationship in August 2015.

In Summer 2018, Christel stated that she was in a relationship with Sam Restango, a Canadian businessman. In 2019, the actress and her son relocated to Toronto, Ontarios, to be with Restagno and late moved back to Los Angeles in July 2020.

Bryton James Children Details

Bryton James does not currently have any children. On March 16, 2011, James married Ashley Leisinger in Fullerton, California, in a ceremony performed by his The Young and the Restless co-star Christian LeBlanc.

Unfortunately, after four years of marriage, the actor confirmed their divorce on February 20, 2014, and further claimed they were still close friends.

The couple doesnât have any children from their marriage. After the separation, Bryton started dating in May 2015 with Sterling Victorian. However, their relationship didnât last long, and they later got separated.

Currently, the actor is sharing a warm relationship with his partner Brytni Sarpy. The couples have been in a relationship since May 2019.

Bryton James Net Worth Explored

Bryton James has an estimated net worth of $3 million (approx), while the American actor has not revealed his exact figure of income and career earnings to date.

Having impressive wealth, Bryton also accumulated a lucrative fortune from other worlds, such as advertisements, cameo appearances, etc.

As per the reports, the actor boasts an annual salary of $500 thousand to $950 thousand or above. Moreover, the actor is also associated with many charitable organizations and further donates 10% of his income to charities.

In addition, James has also served as a spokesperson for Recording Astist, Actors, and Athletes Against Drunk Driving (RADD) since 1996. James is also known for being a cast of Nickelodeonâs animated series, Glitch Techs (2018).

Meet Bryton James On Instagram

Bryton James is easily accessible on Instagram under the username. Bryton is quite famous on social media and enjoys 132k followers on Instagram.

Moreover, he seems to be very active on his social accounts and has 424 posts on his Instagram. Peeking into his Instagram account, one can primarily view his career-related stuff.

The actor was born on August 17, 1986, in Lakewood, California, U.S, and is thirty-five years old. Apart from acting, Bryton is also an avid singer.
